definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Eco-fashion has certainly proved that it has enough caché in the fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 生態時裝還證明它在時尚界有着足夠的影響力。

sentences.english: A major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: Fashion designer Tommy Hilfiger was fully aware of the power of youth culture.
sentences.chinese: 時裝設計師湯米海肥哥完全意識到年輕文化的力量。

sentences.english: Describe your philosophy about the art of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 描述一下你的時裝藝術哲學。

sentences.english: In Milan his spectacular shows immediately become the must-see appointment during the men's fashion week.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他的時裝秀成爲男裝時裝週中不可錯過的品牌。

sentences.english: In Milan his spectacular shows immediately become the must-see appointment during the men's fashion week.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他的時裝秀成爲男裝時裝週中不可錯過的品牌。

sentences.english: They give you some ideas about what kinds of clothes are coming into fashion and what are going out.
sentences.chinese: 他們向您提供的概念可區別流行時裝和過時服裝。

sentences.english: In addition, a major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: Deepa wears one of her designs at the Jhoole fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 時裝秀穿她的一件設計衣服。

sentences.english: But they are showing what will be all the rage next year.
sentences.chinese: 但他們展出的是一些明年要流行的時裝。

sentences.english: I mean, there's a lot of fashion schools in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 我想說，英國有很多時裝學校。

sentences.english: Please ask her about the fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 請問問她關於時裝表演會的情況。

sentences.english: Georgian fashion designers show their Spring-Summer, 2011 women's collections.
sentences.chinese: 格魯吉亞時裝設計師展示2011年春夏女裝。

sentences.english: A time is installed that can go with all sorts of scheduled operation.
sentences.chinese: 設有自動定時裝置，可配合混合時間生產作業。

sentences.english: There are many upscale fashion shops and trendy boutiques in the area.
sentences.chinese: 有許多高檔時裝店和時髦的精品屋領域。

definition: to see through/perspective/to examine by fluoroscopy (i.e. X-ray)
